name: OcieTopia Chrome
description:
I participate on a game jam called "RPG Mania IV" and seems i love rpg games that much, why not join in and make a game of it! 

INSTRUCTIONS

-WASD to move

-TAB to go to party section

Again there isnt too much about this game, its more of a test project of see how far i can go on gdevelop 5!

Inspiration bits!

-FNAF World owned by Scott Cawthon

-Pokemon owned by Game Freak
